front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Specification of Scope and Deliverable Requirements for an Arc-flash Hazard Calculation Study in Accordance With IEEE 1584
front.abstract: This document provides guidance for the specification and performance of an Arc-Flash Hazard Calculation Study, in accordance with the process defined inIEEE Std 1584, Guide for Performing an Arc-Flash Calculations Study (Arc-Flash Study). It outlines the minimun recommended requirements to enable the owner or its representative to specify an Arc-Flash Study, including scope of work and associated deliverables.
